channel.title: Weather at Chicago / West Chicago, Dupage Airport, IL - via NOAA's National Weather Service
channel.description: Weather conditions from NOAA's National Weather Service.

item.title: Overcast and Breezy and 52 F at Chicago / West Chicago, Dupage Airport, IL
item.description: Winds are from the West at 24.2 gusting to 31.1 MPH (21 gusting to 27 KT). The pressure is 1020.8 mb and the humidity is 64%. The wind chill is 46. Last Updated on May 12 2015, 1:52 pm CDT.
